name: nextream
description: A Netflix-like streaming platform with client and admin applications

scripts.setup: node -e "const os = require('os'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const isWin = os.platform() === 'win32'; execSync(isWin ? 'setup-local-dev.bat' : './setup-local-dev.sh', {stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.start: node -e "const os = require('os'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const isWin = os.platform() === 'win32'; execSync(isWin ? 'start-dev.bat' : './start-dev.sh', {stdio: 'inherit'});"
